resources.string: Ebola is what scientists call a haemorraghic fever - it operates by making its victims bleed from almost anywhere on their body. Usually, victims bleed to death from Ebola.
Ebola is highly contagious; being transmitted via contact with body fluids such as blood, saliva, semen or body discharges. Ebola is NOT AIRBORNE!
About 60 to 90 of people that catch Ebola will die from it. It is one of the deadliest diseases in the world, killing in a few weeks.
This is the sad part - Ebola has no known cure. But victims can be treated for symptoms and have been known to recover with intensive care.
Ebola is contagious by 3 major ways. If you do not fall in these 3 categories, you are unlikely to catch it.
Contact with body fluids of someone who is VISIBLY sick with the disease. Remember, Ebola is NOT AIRBORNE!
Contact with the body of someone who has died from Ebola. That means that dead bodies are still contagious.
Contact with an animal that is carrying the virus; usually fruit bats and monkeys
Wash Your Hands with Soap and Water
Do this a lot. You can also use a good hand sanitizer. Avoid unnecessary contact!
The virus cannot survive disinfectants, heat, direct sunlight, detergents and soaps. Clean up! You might want to fumigate if you have pests.
Report any suspicious symptoms in yourself or anyone else IMMEDIATELY you notice them. Do not delay!!
Use protective gear if you must care or go near someone you suspect has Ebola. Also, dead bodies can still transmit Ebola. Do not touch them without protective gear or avoid them altogether.
Tell your neighbors, colleagues and domestic staff. You are safer when everyone is educated about Ebola.
Do not Handle Dead Bush Meat
Some animals are reservoirs of the virus. It might be better to restrict yourself to food you prepared yourself.
John G Lake was a great man of God, but he died before Ebola was discovered. How could he have cured it? Faith without works is dead. Pray but protect yourself.
No one has been cured or protected from Ebola by taking bitter kola. If you feel like bitter kola, eat it but protect yourself!
Salt and hot water do not protect against viruses. If it did, it would also cure HIV!
